name: The Villainous Emperor Snatching The Destiny Of The Chosen One
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhua
content: In his past life, Xu Tian was the strongest villain, but he was ultimately schemed against and ganged up on by countless “chosen ones,” leading to his death. Now reincarnated, Xu Tian decides to fight fire with fire. Since no one played fair with him before, he won’t play fair either! Armed with a system that lets him “steal opportunities,” Xu Tian roams the world, snatching heaven-defying fortunes and turning the “chosen ones” into his subordinates, making them earn gold for him.
